video_prompt: A notebook opens. A hand enters the frame, holds one page, while another hand draws on the opposite page with a green pencil. The drawing comes to life with glowing, multicolored trails emanating from a vibrant, illustrated cat and girl. The notebook angle subtly shifts as text appears.
image_prompt: Vibrantly colored, hand-drawn illustration of a rainbow cat and a girl, created in a spiral-bound notebook. Focus on the illuminated notebook with a hand drawing with a green pencil, set against a dark background. Features include "C29" text, glowing multi-colored trails, and a "AI generated" watermark.
refined_video_prompt: The notebook's cover pivots open. A hand enters the frame, pressing down on one page, while another hand actively draws with a green pencil on the opposite page. The drawn cat and girl begin to glow, emitting multicolored trails that actively expand across the surface. The notebook subtly shifts its angle as text dynamically materializes on the page.
